item.title: A Fast Lightweight Time-Series Store for IoT Data
item.description: In this paper, we present an efficient architecture for time-series data management that provides a high data ingestion rate, while still being sufficiently lightweight that it can be deployed in embedded environments or small virtual machines.

item.title: The Website Obesity Crisis
item.description:
The Website Obesity Crisis

Let me start by saying that beautiful websites come in all sizes and page weights. I love big websites packed with images. I love high-resolution video. I love sprawling Javascript experiments or well-designed web apps.
